title: How to Make a Mushroom Round Steak

steps.headline: Add flour, salt and pepper to a resealable food storage bag.
Seal bag and shake to combine ingredients.
Brown steaks on both sides in hot oil.
Spoon condensed mushroom soup over steaks.
Add soup cans of water around steaks.
steps.description: Try to avoid pour water directly on steaks to prevent diluting the soup.

steps.headline: Cover and simmer until tender, about 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
Remove steaks from skillet and thicken to make gravy, optional.

text: Slice the round steak. Tenderize steak, as necessary. Add flour, salt and pepper to a resealable food storage bag.  Seal bag and shake to combine ingredients.  Open food bag and steaks. Shake to coat. Heat vegetable oil in skillet.  Brown steaks on both sides in hot oil.  Spoon condensed mushroom soup over steaks.  Add soup cans of water around steaks. Try to avoid pour water directly on steaks to prevent diluting the soup. Cover and simmer until tender, about 1 1/2 to 2 hours.  Remove steaks from skillet and thicken to make gravy, optional.  Finished.
